an10.100:4.1: “Mendicants, without giving up six things you can’t realize perfection.
an10.100:4.3: Greed, hate, delusion, anger, hostility, denigration, insolence, jealousy, stinginess, and conceit.
an10.100:4.4: Without giving up these ten qualities you can’t realize perfection.
an10.100:5.1: After giving up ten things you can realize perfection.
an10.100:5.3: Greed, hate, delusion, anger, hostility, denigration, insolence, jealousy, stinginess, and conceit.
an10.100:5.4: After giving up these ten things you can realize the fruit of perfection.”
